question: hijust a few questions, for the last few months my eyes had been in pain and had photophobia. light sensitivity,  i have got eye  floaters and also i have the red veins, my concern is the yellow tint of the  whites of my eyes, i have been tested for bilirubin levels and they are normal so its not the liver, my question is, can this be diabetic retropathy? as the yellow being the sign of blood, also the red veins, i have been tested for diabetes and i havent got it, but i have been fairly ill and week for many months, at one point my sugar levels dropped very low and i was having hyperglycemia symptoms for a few weeks.my eyes had been checked by a eye MD and they also confirmed a yellow tint to them, the  pains and the inflamation has gone, just left with red viens, light yellow tint and floaters.
title: question on diabetic retnopathy complication
